subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Justin Tuck’s 4th-quarter touchdown — his first since his junior year at Notre Dame — transformed a perilous 7-point Giants’ lead into a comfortable 41-13 victory.
snippet: Justin Tuck’s 4th-quarter touchdown — his first since his junior year at Notre Dame — transformed a perilous 7-point Giants’ lead into a comfortable 41-13 victory.
